Package model.business

Class Chat

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.business.Chat
  • public class Chat
extends java.lang.Object
    this class is responsible for keeping a cached version of a chat

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<Message> history
      history of the chat
      private int ID
      ID of the chat
      private boolean isGroup
      decides if its a private/group chat (false/true)
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> members
      members of the chat (their employeeIDs)

      name of the chat

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addMember​(int employeeID)
      adds a member
      boolean equals​(java.lang.Object obj)
      two Chats counts as identical if their ID is identical or they are both private chats and contains the same members

      returns the history

      returns the ID

      returns the name

      returns the isGroup

      used to decide if an employee is a member of this chat or not
      (package private) void loadMessage​(Message message)
      adds a message to the history
      (package private) void orderMessages()
      orders the messages according to their timestamps (uses bubble order)
      (package private) void overWrite​(Chat chat)
      overwrites name, isGroup, members attributes with the other chat's attributes in the argument

      removes a member
